section-block.flip_chart-concept-question: How can we help animals stay healthy?

flip_chart-teacher-facing-content-box.flip_chart-teacher-facing-paragraph: Do you have a pet? Do you want to get a pet? Pets are so much fun. But the most important part of having a pet is caring for it. Whether your pet is a dog, a goldfish, a bird, or a bearded dragon, caring for your pet helps keep it safe, healthy, and happy.

flip_chart-ul.flip_chart-li: 1. Provide a safe home for your pet.
3. Give your pet fresh water to drink.
4. Clean your pet with a gentle bath.
5. Help your pet get plenty of exercise.
6. Give your pet lots of love!
